Anyways, we would like to keep this tradition by making the ANN here.

Everybody makes mistakes, we are just humans, not robots.¬† You should do that yourself there is an option to move this thread but you have to use your common sense we'll know if you deserve to be the promoter of one projectQuoteIt's kind of a good manner to make announcements of new projects on bitcointalk forum. Anyways, we would like to keep this tradition by making the ANN here. What kind of observation is that you mean projects are being promoted here because of tradition if you think that traffic here is not that good then show us data and why it's not good, if you're posting here because of tradition then leave we have too many idiots promoters here in Bitcointalk.

comments.author: BlaBlaGame.io
comments.body: Quote from: Saisher on May 14, 2022, 08:28:55 AMQuote from: BlaBlaGame.io on May 14, 2022, 08:23:09 AMIf this is really true and we made a mistake choosing the right section of the forum, we kindly ask the mods to help us to move this thread to the right one. Everybody makes mistakes, we are just humans, not robots.¬† You should do that yourself there is an option to move this thread but you have to use your common sense we'll know if you deserve to be the promoter of one projectWhat do you mean by 'one project'? We are not interested in third-party projects and don't seek for smb's blessing to be promoters of smth. Quote from: Saisher on May 14, 2022, 08:28:55 AMWhat kind of observation is that you mean projects are being promoted here because of tradition if you think that traffic here is not that good then show us data and why it's not good, if you're posting here because of tradition then leave we have too many idiots promoters here in Bitcointalk.We took a decision to make the ANN so that it could be convenient to our community to get the news from here. Some people prefer BTT rather than other platforms to read the updates. That's why we are here. If we take another decision to leave the forum, we will let you know. As for the traffic, we have been here since 2017. We are a team of blockchain developers. And we do know that the traffic trends has changed dramatically. But it doesn't mean we don't want to use BTT as a source of traffic. We do really want.

comments.author: BlaBlaGame.io
comments.body: Dear BlaBlaGamers,Today we prepared an amazing article for you about different strategies you can use playing Rock-Paper-Scissors game.üî• Have you ever heard about Martingale tactic?It‚Äôs a betting strategy which is based on the principle of raising the bets every time after a loss. Every time you lose, you must increase the bet, taking into account previous losses.An example:1. The game starts, the bets are placed.2. After each loss, the player must increase the bet so that if he wins, he will pay off all past losses in this series, with a small income (for example, 1‚Äì2‚Äì4‚Äì8‚Äì16‚Äì32‚Äì64, etc.). If the sequence is followed, the player‚Äôs profit when winning will be equal to the initial bet.3.In case of a win, the player must return back to the initial bet.Many people play using the Martingale technique with a large number of bets. For example, they make five bets of 10 cents, then in case of loss ‚Äî 5 of 20, etc.This strategy is win-win, since the player cannot lose indefinitely.There are also two more tactics based on human psychology:‚òùÔ∏è The first strategy is countertactic-strategy. Let‚Äôs imagine that you played Rock and your opponent played Paper in the first round. The chance that your opponent will play paper again is very high. So now what you should do is to play scissors. In short the rule is: play the bid object that wasn‚Äôt played in previous round.‚úåÔ∏è The second strategy is a mirror-strategy. If you won in the first round, in the next round choose the bid object that your opponent played before, because he or she will think that you are going to play the same combination.üå±These strategies should work unless your opponent knows about them.‚ö°Actually, the best Rock-Paper-Scissors strategy is to play randomly ‚Äî play each bid object one-third of the time to make your opponent not to guess what‚Äôs next. This tactic is called Nash Equilibrium: both players act randomly, they do not switch strategies because it‚Äôs not possible to increase your chances to win in more than one-third cases.Here are some more interesting observations:üí° Man without experience in this game statistically most often will go with Rock in his first move. Experienced man will not use Rock in his first round.üí° Woman statistically most often will go with Scissors in the first round.üí° If the opponent plays with the same option two times in a raw, he or she will unlikely use the same option for the third time.üí° If you are in a total loss, throw Paper. Scissors is statistically the most rare throw, Rock is the most often, so Paper will give you the best chance to win.Now you are fully armed and ready! Let‚Äôs play!üïπÔ∏è Play Rock-Paper-Scissors: https://blablagame.io/gamesüî• Buy BlaBla tokens: https://blablagame.io/buy-bla-tokensüí° Do not forget to subscribe BlaBlaGame social media channels:Telegram: https://t.me/BlaBlaGame_EnglishTwitter: https://twitter.com/BlaBlaGameFi
